REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f0660 reute u f BC-CARGILL-U.K.-STRIKE-T 03-05 0059

TEXT.TITLE: CARGILL U.K. STRIKE TALKS POSTPONED TILL MONDAY
TEXT.BODY: Talks set for today between management and unions to try to solve the labour dispute at Cargill U.K. Ltd's Seaforth oilseed crushing plant have been rescheduled for Monday, a company spokesman said. Oilseed processing at the mill has been at a standstill since December 19. REUTER
